subject: I've successfully applied the theme colors throughout your SyncTone app. Here's what was updated:
body:
Files Modified (14 total):
1. Theme Configuration
Created styles/theme.js with your color palette
Updated tailwind.config.js to register the custom colors
2. Components (6 files)
MessageBubble.tsx - Message bubbles now use primary (sent) and backgroundElevated (received)
ComposeBar.tsx - Input bar uses backgroundElevated, send button uses secondary
ChatListItem.tsx - Chat items use backgroundElevated with secondary badges
ToneSelector.tsx - Category tabs use secondary, buttons use theme colors
ToneComparison.tsx - Match indicators use accent/secondary, backgrounds use backgroundElevated
EmptyState.tsx - Icons and text use theme colors
3. Screens (5 files)
home.tsx - Header uses backgroundElevated, stats use secondary/accent, Create button uses secondary
chat/[id].tsx - All backgrounds and UI elements themed
create.tsx - Code display and buttons use theme colors
join.tsx - Input and error messages themed
_layout.tsx - Loading/error states use theme colors
(app)/_layout.tsx - Stack background set to #12141f
Color Mapping Applied:
Background: #12141f - Main app background
Background Elevated: #1d2034 - Cards, headers, elevated surfaces
Primary: #6a7498 - Sent messages, borders, accents
Secondary: #d4a89c - CTAs, badges, highlights
Accent: #f0d8d0 - Status indicators, success states
Text: #ffffff - Primary text
Text Secondary: #9ca4c0 - Secondary/muted text
All hardcoded colors have been replaced with the theme colors, and shadow colors have been updated to match the new palette. The app now has a consistent, cohesive visual design! ðŸŽ¨
